author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND ERIN IS NOW A CATASTROPHIC CATEGORY 5 HURRICANE...
summary: ...AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND ERIN IS NOW A CATASTROPHIC CATEGORY 5 HURRICANE... As of 11:20 AM AST Sat Aug 16 the center of Erin was located near 19.7, -62.8 with movement W at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 917 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 160 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND ERIN IS NOW A CATASTROPHIC CATEGORY 5 HURRICANE... As of 11:20 AM AST Sat Aug 16 the center of Erin was located near 19.7, -62.8 with movement W at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 917 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 160 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Erin (AT5/AL052025)
